description:
Class D has achieved a degree of unity in facing the special test, so Ayanokoji and Horikita head out to see how the other classes are getting along. Class B is working together to make a comfortable life for themselves, while Class A remains secretive.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Den farligste Forræder blandt alle er den, ethvert Menneske har i sig selv.
Every Man Has in Himself the Most Dangerous Traitor of All.
Le plus dangereux dans la traîtrise, c’est que chacun cache un traître au fond de soi.
Uragirimono no Naka de Mottomo Kiken Naru Uragirimono wa Nanika to Ieba, Subete no Ningen ga Onore Jishin no Naibu ni Kakushite Iru Tokoro no Mono de Aru.
يملك كلّ رجلٍ داخله أخطر خائن
裏切者の中で最も危険なる裏切者は何かといえば, すべての人間が己れ自身の内部にかくしているところのものである.
배신자 중 가장 위험한 배신자는 모든 인간이 자신의 마음속에 숨긴 그것이다
